channel.title: InfernalPK || Near-Perfect Combat || Perfect Switching
channel.description:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/c4nsuhml412h40k/InfernalPk%20Client%20%2B%20Cache.zip
Read the txt doc first before playing.
Everything on this server was made for one single reason, to be the leading pking server on the server list, please join me, I'm always online waiting for people to log on, to greet and make your time worthwhile. Please add my Skype Name: Clarkniss . I'd enjoy to meet every single one of the players. Here is a list of the staff:
Owner: Tuhcow || Co-Owners: "LeftHookHoe" & "Kevin(Developer)" -All Weapon Specials 100% -100% Overloads -PERFECT Switching -Near Perfect Combat -Free For All Minigame -100% Animated Nex -100% Animated Nomad -100% Animated Jad -100% Corporeal Beast -Pk Title Shops -Donator Crown Support -All Pvp Armours & Weapons 100% -All Nex Armours 100% With Effect -No Lag -Custom Interfaces -Better graphics -Player Clipping -NPC Clipping -Spawn Tab -Interactive Quest Tab -All Dungeoneering Items + Effects -Spawn Server - Pkp shop(you can't spawn everything) -Much More!
Register on our website:(you can also download the client here) http://tuhcowrsps.webs.com/apps/forums/topics/show/9300499-infernalpk-is-live-download-here-
Add my Skype Name: Clarkniss
